'''Marvelous Merchandise''' is an [[event]] in [[Version 1.2]].

==Event Guidelines==
===Eligibility===
[[Adventure Rank]] 12 and above.

===Rules===
#During the event, players can search throughout the world for a merchant named [[Liben]] and submit the materials that he requests to him.
# [[Liben]] will have various rewards prepared, and these rewards may differ across different players' worlds. Players may choose to enter others' worlds to claim different rewards from Boxes o' Marvels.
# During the event period, [[Liben]] will offer travelers a total of 7 different [[#Reward Pool|Boxes o' Marvels]].
# Travelers can only get up to 1 chance per day to submit materials. Note that when the rewards refresh daily, the opportunity to submit materials, if unused, will be lost.
# After trading in materials a total of 5 times, players may open a [[#Mega Box o' Marvels Rewards|Mega Box o' Marvels]] and obtain the reward within.

===Location===
[[Liben]] can be found at the [[City of Mondstadt]].
